FirmwareInfoDef.description: This indicates the properties which apply to all firmwares

VendorIANA.description: The IANA Enterprise Id of the hardware vendor

CompatibleHardware.description: The compatible hardware with name format com.<vendor>.Hardware.<XXX> specified by vendor in phosphor-dbus-interfaces

EEPROMDeviceFirmware.description: The configuration parameters for flashing the EEPROM device

Name.description: The unique identifier or label for the EEPROM device

Bus.description: The I2C bus index to which the EEPROM device is attached

Address.description: The I2C address of the EEPROM device on the specified bus

MuxGPIOs.description: The GPIO configuration for the mux that switches the EEPROM connection to the BMC

Name.description: The name of the GPIO line used for toggling the connection

ChipName.description: The name of the GPIO chip managing the specified GPIO line

Polarity.description: The GPIO polarity depicting its active status
